import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API;export const getMyTimeSheets=token=>{return axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/timesheets"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export const createTimeSheet=(data,token)=>{return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/timesheets"),data,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export const deleteTimeSheet=(id,token)=>{return axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/timesheets/").concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};// เพิ่มฟังก์ชันนี้สำหรับแก้ไข Timesheet
export const updateTimeSheet=(id,data,token)=>{return axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/timesheets/").concat(id),data,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
